snippet: The Treasury Department said on Friday that the deficit in August totaled $64.4 billion, a drop of 50 percent from the same month a year ago.
abstract: Treasury Department reports deficit was $64.4 billion in August, down 50 percent from August 2014.
lead_paragraph: The Treasury Department said on Friday that the deficit in August totaled $64.4 billion, a drop of 50 percent from the same month a year ago.

headline.main: Deficit Is Running 10 Percent Below Last Year’s Level
headline.print_headline: Deficit Is Running 10 Percent Below Last Year’s Level
